channel.title: Seight Custom Cycling Wear: New Products - Shorts & Bib Shorts
channel.description: A list of the new products at Seight Custom Cycling Wear.

item.title: Seight Custom Full Length Winter Bib Tights
item.description:
Heading out for a ride in winter may seem like the wrong idea, however the only that can really be wrong is to be wearing the wrong clothes on your ride. Wearing the Seight Full Length Winter Bib Tights is definitely the right idea in winter, as our high performi..

Price: $140.91

item.title: Seight Custom Full Length Elite Bib Tights
item.description:
Seight Full Length Elite Bib Tights are called Elite for a very good reason. They are designed with highly functional material and contain an anatomically shaped chamois for maximum performance and comfort. The fabric easily transfers moisture and regulates tempe..

Price: $136.36

item.title: Seight Custom Full Length Elite Tights
item.description:
With a material that fits perfectly like a second skin, a chamois that provides exceptional comfort and support, Seight Full Length Elite Tights are simply the best on the market. They are made with only the the best Italian lycra. Utilising fatlock stitching tec..

Price: $119.09

item.title: Seight Custom 3/4 Elite Winter Bib Shorts
item.description:
Are you longing for a warm winter ride? The Seight 3/4 Winter Bib Shorts are what you should have in mind. They are designed with fleecy lycra fabrics to give your body maximum protection from the cold. The chamois is anatomically shaped to fit perfectly and supp..

Price: $115.45

item.title: Seight Custom 3/4 Elite Bib Shorts
item.description:
These Seight 3/4 Elite Bib Shorts are made with 240gsm sublimated Lycra fabric for superb performance, easy moisture transfer and great comfort. They are equipped with a multi level unsublimated chamois that is anatomically shaped to enhance comfort, and efficie..

Price: $110.91
